results.title: Effects of preoperative beta-blocker on blood loss and blood transfusion during spinal surgeries with sodium nitroprusside-controlled hypotension
results.text_hl: Also, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ group showed less intraoperative @<m>DISEASE_Blood_Loss_Surgical</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016063 @@@blood loss@@@ and less amount of blood transfused than the other group.
